definition: 100 ml/one-tenth of a peck/measure for dry grain equal to one-tenth of sheng 升 or liter, or one-hundredth dou 斗
to close/to join/to fit/to be equal to/whole/together/round (in battle)/conjunction (astronomy)/1st note of pentatonic scale/old variant of 盒[he2]
round/lump/ball/to roll into a ball/to gather/regiment/group/society/classifier for a lump or a soft mass: wad (of paper), ball (of wool), cloud (of smoke)

sentences.english: She was the soprano part leader in the University Choir, HKUSTSU.
sentences.chinese: 林氏曾为香港科技大学学生会合唱团女高音声部部长。

sentences.english: With the formal suits but humorous gestures, the Chorale made their first appearance.
sentences.chinese: 正式的着装，诙谐的动作，是该合唱团的出场秀。

sentences.english: And we had competitions and choir and music every year.
sentences.chinese: 并且我们每年都会有比赛，合唱团和其他音乐节目。

sentences.english: Colorado Children's Chorale is one of the three best children's chorales.
sentences.chinese: 科罗拉多童声合唱团是世界最著名的三大合唱团之一。

sentences.english: Colorado Children's Chorale is one of the three best children's chorales.
sentences.chinese: 科罗拉多童声合唱团是世界最著名的三大合唱团之一。

sentences.english: I was a member of the university singing club for two years.
sentences.chinese: 我曾两年担任学校合唱团的团员。

sentences.english: The boy sings bass in the choir.
sentences.chinese: 那男孩在合唱团里唱男低音。

sentences.english: The Chorus recounts the events leading to Antigone's tragedy.
sentences.chinese: 合唱团的叙述了事件导致安提戈涅的悲剧。

sentences.english: The chorus spoke from a hard-surfaced circle (orchestra) at the center of the audience.
sentences.chinese: 合唱团在观众中心的硬地上表演。

sentences.english: and there's one that does rock songs.
sentences.chinese: 还有一个合唱团唱摇滚歌曲。

sentences.english: Lea Michele as Rachel Berry on FOX's Glee.
sentences.chinese: 丽亚米雪儿在《欢乐合唱团》里出演的雷切尔贝瑞。

sentences.english: Join a choir or a drama club.
Worship services, choir, and music ensembles are easily mixed and recorded live.
sentences.chinese: 崇拜服务，合唱团，和音乐合奏容易混合和录制现场。

sentences.english: The staff chorus of Daqing Patrol Chemical Complex was set up in1990.
sentences.chinese: 大庆石油化工总厂职工合唱团组建于1990年。

sentences.english: In reply came a chorus of rebukes.
sentences.chinese: 她这行为引来了一个合唱团的谴责。

sentences.english: Apostles and Prophets in high relief on the walls of the east choir.
sentences.chinese: 使徒和先知的高浮雕对东合唱团的墙壁。

definition: musical ensemble of several instruments (e.g. duet 二重奏 or trio 三重奏)
